text: Magar nadidaī, ki Alloh taolo on ciro, ki dar osmonho va on ciro, ki dar zamin ast, medonad? Heç naçvoe mijoni se nafar naʙoşad, magar on ki Ū cahorumini onhost va na mijoni panç nafar, magar on ki Ū şaşumini onhost va na kamtar az in [adad] na ʙeştar, magar on ki har kuço ʙoşand, Ū hamrohi onhost. Sipas rūzi qijomat onhoro az on ci kardaand, ʙoxaʙar mesozad. Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙa hama ciz donost
